word:
For those who are looking for the coming of the Lord, for those who are called to be laborers in His vineyard--for all who are fitting themselves for a place in the everlasting kingdom--how important that the brain be clear, and the body as free as possible from disease.--Undated Ms 9, pp. 2, 3. ("Hygienic Reform: Our Present Work," no date.) 

Released May 14, 1970.
